snippet: The British publisher Pearson is entertaining offers for The Financial Times that could lead to a much-anticipated sale, Bloomberg News reports. But Pearson has moved to try to discredit the report.
abstract: The British publisher Pearson is entertaining offers for The Financial Times that could lead to a much-anticipated sale, Bloomberg News reports. But Pearson has moved to try to discredit the report.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Financial Times Up for Sale, Report Says, but Pearson Says Not So Fast
